title: e-fgs-c47003-221
text: SABANCI UNIVERSITY RESEARCH PROJECTS CLOSING REPORT Project Title: Project Code Project Commencement – Termination Date: Coordinator: Research personnel (only SU faculty members, post – doc): Name Estimated actual time allocated to the project % Research Assistant Students (to be filled out by PMO) : Name Time worked in the project (month) Scope of scholarship (cash/tuition– term) Part 1– Scientific Outputs of Project: Briefly state main objective of project and results obtained as of the end of project Part 2 – Scientific achievements of project: Give brief information on scientific achievements obtained in the scope of project (eg.: no of publications, SCI, SSCI etc publications, publication types– number of books, essays, conferences etc): Publication:  Presentation (international / domestic):  Patent (patent subject and declaration of discovery / whether or not patent application is made shall be stated)  Product  Award  Other:
